resources.string: A different password for each site. \nNo passwords stored.
To generate a password for a website you have to enter your master key, that only you know. Twik will then generate a unique password for the site.
You need a couple of things before starting:

ul.li: A master key. Don\'t type it now! Just choose and remember one.
A private key. This key will be stored in your device.

Twik is an application that makes it easier to generate secure and different passwords for each website.

Twik is based on the password generation mechanism of Password Hasher by Steve Cooper and Password Hasher Plus by Eric Woodruff.

Twik is also available as a Chrome Extension in the Chrome Web Store.
